resources.string: Welcome to aFridge, a virtual refrigerator organizer that keeps track of all your fridge items.
Never again forget what you have in your refrigerator, let an item expire, or what you need to buy, with the help of this handy organizer application.
For more information, and a quick HOWTO check the \'Help\' section.

- Organize your food by adding items in the virtual fridge by simply clicking on an empty spot. Click on an item to see a detailed view of the product, and choose if you want to delete, or change it. Dismiss the dialog without any changes by simply clicking the back button.

- Click the menu button inside the fridge, and you will see options for checking the products expiration dates, accessing the settings and viewing the items in a simple list. The application will warn you for near expiration, and expired items, at every startup if allowed in the settings.

- Build a virtual shopping list in the \'Fridge Notes\' section. Just click on the empty text field, write a note and click the add button. Click on a note if you want to delete it, or click the menu button to get the option for deleting all the notes.

- Click the menu button on the main screen to access the settings of the application where you can allow automatic expiration date check on every startup, set the minimum number of days for exp. date warning, and see/clear the history of usage.
For questions, complains or compliments, contact me on my Twitter, Facebook, or Google+ page, or send me an E-mail.
aFridge has a Facebook application for sharing notes, that you can access directly on https://apps.facebook.com/android_fridge or via aFridge\'s Share functionality.
On the main menu, click the MENU button and choose Share. From there, you can connect to your Facebook account, write on your FB wall, access the FB app, and retrieve the online notes sent to you.

To send a note, you need to use the users Facebook UID, which is included in the app\'s auto-complete option. Write the name of your FB friend (case sensitive), and click on it in the suggestion box. For more information, go to the FB app fan page on (coming soon).
